issue.title: Docker install instructions out of date

content.raw: It depends if you are using Cuda; then `nvidia-docker2` is recommended. However, before I consider revert back, I’d check first if the solution works perfectly fine locally using docker-compose, but it throws Cuda errors in the in the cloudsim.
content.html: It depends if you are using Cuda; then nvidia-docker2 is recommended. However, before I consider revert back, I’d check first if the solution works perfectly fine locally using docker-compose, but it throws Cuda errors in the in the cloudsim.
